front.title: IANA Registering a SIP Resource Priority Header Field Namespace for Local Emergency Communications

abstract.t: This document creates the new Session Initiation Protocol (SIP) Resource Priority header field namespace "esnet" for local emergency usage in the following cases: to a public safety answering point (PSAP), between PSAPs, and between a PSAP and first responders and their organizations. The document also puts this namespace into the IANA registry.
